featured.text: 1. Visit the websites of these colleges and find out which college has departments ___(27)___ courses that interest you or will help you prepare for your future career.
Since Michael was the best candidate, the committee voted for him to take charge of the company’s sales department.
A new study by the Department of Health in Taiwan shows that more than half of the adult population in Taiwan lacks an understanding of important health problems.

With a DJ playing various kinds of music rather than just rap, and a mix of clothing labels designed more for taste and fashion than for a precise age, department stores have managed to appeal to successful middle-aged women 20 losing their younger customers.

other.text: 2. Are the professors in the departments you plan to ___(28)___ into experts in their own fields? 3.
The traffic department of the government. 55.
According to the passage, breaking into computer codes of banks, large companies, and government departments is (A) a widespread criminal practice.
The amount, the police department reported, would pay the costs of rushing special equipment and eighty police officers in order to save him.
The doors of these department stores slide open _____ when you approach them.

definition.zh_def: 部門；一個組織或機構中的特定部分，通常負責特定的職能或任務。
definition.en_def: A division or section of an organization, typically responsible for a specific function or task.
definition.example: She works in the marketing department of the company.
